primaryFunction: Control room environment, request housekeeping, and provide local tourism recommendations

decisionsMadeBySystem: Interprets verbal intent (e.g., 'I'm cold' means 'Increase thermostat')
Prioritizes guest requests based on urgency (e.g., 'Toilet overflow' vs 'Need extra towels')
actionsExecutedAutomatically: Adjusts IoT smart room controls (lights, temperature, curtains)
Plays music or sets wake-up alarms
actionsRequiringHumanApproval: Charging room service orders to the guest's folio
Booking high-value spa appointments or external tours

howErrorsAreDetected: User says 'Stop' or 'Talk to a person'
whenHumansAreInvolved: When a guest reports a maintenance emergency
When voice commands fail to resolve a billing dispute
fallbackBehaviour: Place an automated voice call to the Front Desk on the guest's behalf
Visual prompt on the bedside tablet to type the request
